citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 18-OCT-
2021.
Spoke with licensee and licensee's son (facility representative) and no one was available for an inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
WILLIAM HEINE, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
